channel.title: Silent Scientist
channel.description:
Is this guy meant to say anything... because he doesn't. Even when I press E on him.
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/33908159/bm_c2a3b0000.jpg[/img]
Status and Getpos stuffs: [code]] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c2a3b at: 3638 x, -677 y, 248 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 3 "[J<3J] dwn-010 a i r m a n" UNKNOWN 20:06 22 0 active loopback ] getpos setpos 3638.951172 -677.489380 248.031250;setang 5.902455 134.651031 0.000000[/code]
Edit: Found out that you have to go right up to the wall behind him to close the door behind you and THEN he talks to you.

item.title: Silent Scientist
item.dc:creator: TOOMtheRaccoon
item.description:
I’m now the second time in ‘apprehension’ and the scientist don’t talk to me again. Not even after I gave him a few affectionate slaps on the back of the head. With a crowbar.

Maybe because I killed ichy before? The part where you get the crossbow.

Read full topic
